text:
Bugzilla is used for tracking bugs and enhancements. The mailing list is used for usage questions.

The information you gave suggests a usage problem.

You can subscribe to the users making list at
http://jmeter.apache.org/mail2.html

You can send questions to the list as son as you are subscribed.
